body.p: Oracc OB-Freie Regular is a minor adaptation of Corvin Ziegeler's OB-Freie Regular font. The sign forms are based on C. Mittermayer, Altbabylonische Zeichenliste der sumerisch-literarischen Texte, listed in OSL as ABZL.
The original font was obtained from https://github.com/crzfub/OB-Freie/blob/main/OBFreie in October 2024.
Oracc OB-Freie Regular is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1 as required by the licensing terms of OB-Freie.
All of the Oracc fonts are downloadable from the Oracc II GitHub repository.
In Oracc projects the font is selected with the CSS class osf-oobf.
